original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Levi: Lord, your Urim and Thummim belong to your faithful servants, the Levites. You tested them at Massah. You argued with them at the springs of water at Meribah. 33: See Exodus 17:7. I pray this for the tribe of Levi: Lord, your Urim and Thummim belong to your faithful servants, the Levites. You tested them at Massah. You argued with them at the springs of water at Meribah. 33: See Exodus 17:7. I pray this for the tribe of Levi: Lord, your Urim and Thummim belong to your faithful servants, the Levites. You tested them at Massah. You argued with them at the springs of water at Meribah. 33: See Exodus 17:7. I pray this for the tribe of Levi:
korean_text: 레위에 대하여는 일렀으되 주의 둠밈과 우림이 주의 경건한 자에게 있도다 주께서 그를 맛사에서 시험하시고 므리바 물 가에서 그와 다투셨도다

sentences.original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Levi:
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 레위 지파를 위해 이렇게 기도합니다:

sentences.original_text: at the springs of water at Meribah.
